apply_immediately.description: Specifies whether any cluster modifications are applied immediately, or during the next maintenance window. Default is `false`

backup_retention_period.description: The days to retain backups for. Default `9`

cluster_engine.description: The name of the database engine to be used for this DB cluster. Valid Values: `aurora-mysql`, `aurora-postgresql`

cluster_name.description: The name of the database cluster

create_db_cluster_parameter_group.description: Determines whether a cluster parameter should be created or use existing

create_db_subnet_group.description: Determines whether to create the database subnet group or use existing

create_random_password.description: Determines whether to create random password for RDS primary cluster

database_name.description: Name for an automatically created database on cluster creation

db_cluster_parameter_group_family.description: The family of the DB cluster parameter group

db_cluster_parameter_group_parameters.description: A list of DB cluster parameters to apply. Note that parameters may differ from a family to an other

db_subnet_group_name.description: The name of the subnet group name (existing or created)

deletion_protection.description: If the DB instance should have deletion protection enabled. The database can't be deleted when this value is set to `true`. The default is `false`

enabled_cloudwatch_logs_exports.description: Set of log types to export to cloudwatch. If omitted, no logs will be exported. The following log types are supported: `audit`, `error`, `general`, `slowquery`, `postgresql`

kms_key_id.description: The ARN for the KMS encryption key. When specifying `kms_key_id`, `storage_encrypted` needs to be set to `true`

master_password.description: Password for the master DB user. Note - when specifying a value here, 'create_random_password' should be set to `false`

master_username.description: Username for the master DB user

skip_final_snapshot.description: Determines whether a final snapshot is created before the cluster is deleted. If true is specified, no snapshot is created

storage_encrypted.description: Specifies whether the DB cluster storage is encrypted. The default is `true`

instance_class.description: The instance type of the RDS instance

backup_retention_period.description: The days to retain backups for. Default `9`

master_password.description: Password for the master DB user.

master_username.description: Username for the master DB user

instance_name.description: The name of the database instance

database_name.description: Name for an automatically created database on cluster creation

major_engine_version.description: Specifies the major version of the engine that this option group should be associated with

db_instance_family.description: The family of the DB parameter group

default_labels.description: The key/value labels for the master instances.

labels.description: The resource labels to represent user provided metadata.

memory_size_mb.description: Memcache memory size in MiB. Defaulted to 1024

name.description: The ID of the instance or a fully qualified identifier for the instance.

node_count.description: Number of nodes in the memcache instance.

project_id.description: The project ID to manage the Cloud SQL resources

region.description: The region of the Cloud SQL resources

zones.description: Zones where memcache nodes should be provisioned. If not provided, all zones will be used.

alternative_location_id.description: The alternative zone where the instance will be provisioned. a.k.a ( secondary availability zone )

auth_enabled.description: Indicates whether OSS Redis AUTH is enabled for the instance. If set to true AUTH is enabled on the instance.

connect_mode.description: The connection mode of the Redis instance. Can be either DIRECT_PEERING or PRIVATE_SERVICE_ACCESS. The default connect mode if not provided is DIRECT_PEERING.

customer_managed_key.description: Default encryption key to apply to the Redis instance. Defaults to null (Google-managed).

default_labels.description: The key/value labels for the master instances.

display_name.description: An arbitrary and optional user-provided name for the instance.

labels.description: The resource labels to represent user provided metadata.

location_id.description: The zone where the instance will be provisioned. If not provided, the service will choose a zone for the instance. For STANDARD_HA tier, instances will be created across two zones for protection against zonal failures. If [alternativeLocationId] is also provided, it must be different from [locationId].

maintenance_policy.description: The maintenance policy for an instance.

memory_size_gb.description: Redis memory size in GiB. Defaulted to 1 GiB

name.description: The ID of the instance or a fully qualified identifier for the instance.

project_id.description: The project ID to manage the Cloud SQL resources

region.description: The region of the Cloud SQL resources

replica_count.description: The number of replicas. Valid only when 'READ_REPLICAS_DISABLED' Disabled

reserved_ip_range.description: The CIDR range of internal addresses that are reserved for this instance.

tier.description: The service tier of the instance. https://cloud.google.com/memorystore/docs/redis/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.instances#Tier

transit_encryption_mode.description: The TLS mode of the Redis instance, If not provided, TLS is enabled for the instance.
